A kuang tawih (Bacterial stalk rot)
A kuang meihawl dum anga tawih (Charcoal stalk rot)
Hnah rau rawng uka tial (brown stripe Downey Mildew)
A hnah rau val kual (leaf blight)
A kau eitu (Stem borer)
Panganag hmul(Hairy caterpillar)
(Jassid)
A tui hnang dawttu (Aphids)
● A kuang, lei hnaih lam a hnawng bik in a lo uk thet thet a, a tliak awlsam bik thin ani.
● A kau tawih hian rimchhia a chhuah thin bawk.
● A kau tawih hian a kung par lai te a thi thin bawk ani.
● He natna atan hian bleaching powder ( bleaching powder ah hian chlorine 33% a awm tur a ni) a hman theih a, 10kg/ha hi a par hma in leiah theh tur ani.
● Eng thlai pawh huan sir velah phun tiah a tha.
● Bacteria natna hmuh a tui luan tir amaw tlin tir hian natna aput darh zel avangin tih loh tawp tur ani.
● A tlangpuiin, he natna hi a par atanga kar 1-2 naah a lo lang thin.
● A kau lei hnaih lam hi a rawn eng chhuak thin a.
● A kung a lo puitlin pawhin, a kau chhung hi a dum uarh thin a ni.
● A par lai hian a mamawh tawk lekin tui hi pek that tur a ni.
● Trichoderma leh FYM in pawlh @ 2.5kg/acre hi he natna tan hian a tha duh hle. (a mixing (chawhpawlh hi theh atanga ni 10 hmain lo buatsaih lawk tur a ni.
● A hnah hnuai lamah hian dum kelh kelh a lo awm a, a hnuah a lo eng tial in a lo rau chhuak thin a ni.
● Metalaxyl @ 1.5g/L hi he hmuar natna a tan hian a tangkai hle. Kah atanga ni 15 hnuah kah nawn leh tur a ni.
● Rawng uk (eng lek lek) a hnah hnuai lamah a awm kulh thin.
● A nasat chuan vawi thum lai pawh kah tur a ni.
● Huan fai leh thianghlim taka dah tur.
● Zineb @2gm/L a hman theih bawk.
● Pangngang: a eng ukin an awm a, a lu hi a uk khuih thin
● A puitling: a puitling (lungphur) chu buhpawl rawng in an awm thin
● A panganng hian a kau leh kuang a ei kaw pawp hrup thin
● A zikno a ro in a hnah no a ei thin ani. A kuang no chhungah an cheng tlangpui.
● Duhthusamah chuan heng rannung hi lei chhungah an awm thin avangin, nipui lai leh a lei sawngbawl lain thuk taka lei laiha, nisa ah kar 2 tal lei kha pho thin tur a ni.
● Behlawi nena chin pawlh hi a tha hle bawk
● Pangngang: heng pangang hi an rawng a sen a, hmul hriam zum tak tak an nei bawk
● A puitling: an thla leh lam leh lamah hian a dumin a bial kalh kalh thin
● Pangang hian a hnah a ei hek thin
● Neemazal/Neem 5ml/Lvel a hman theih a
● Carbaryl 50% WP @2kg/ha hi tui 1000L ah pawlh a kah tur a ni.
● Pangang hi a tam loh chuan kut a vai mai thin tur.
● A puitling: A pui hi an rawng a hring a, an te em em bawk a, an kat nelh nelh thei bawk
● A hnah leh a kau a tui hnang an zuk chhuakin a hnah leh kung an ti ro thin.
● Natna pu darhtu ber te an ni.
● Viral natna an put darh avangin Jassid awmna re re chu pawh phawi a halral thin tur a ni.
● Imidachlorprid @1.5ml/L emaw Acetamiprid @ 1gm/L hi a tha hle bawk.
● A puitling: a puitling hi rawng hring khawih a puak pep2 thei an ni tlangpui.
● A hnah an zuk ro a, viral natna an pu darh thin bawk.
● Viral natna an put darh thin avangin Aphids awmna re re chu pawh phawi a halral thin tur a ni.
● Imidachlorprid @1.5ml/L emaw Acetamiprid @ 1gm/L hi a tha hle bawk tur.
A tam hri (Panama wilt)
Balhla than thu (Bunchy top)
A hnah de eng (Sigatoka leaf spot)
A hnah leh Rah rau (Anthracnose)
BANANA THRIPS (A par leh a rah tirangtu)
BANANA APHID (A tui hnang dawttu hrik)
PSEUDOSTEM BORER (A bulbal / Kung khertu tuaingawt)
FRUIT AND LEAF SCARRING BEETLE (A hnah leh rah ti rangtu keltelaimawn)
● A tirah a hnah chang lo eng in a ro a,a hnah te a tliak zui ta thin a ni.
● A nasat chuan a hnah no leh chang tawh te an lo ro a, a uai hnup thin ani.
● A hnah bakah a kung a thler in, han tanchhum hian a kung kha a tan chhumna laiah khan a duk thluah thluah in a rimchhe hle thin bawk ani.
● Natna vei balhla kung kha kar a, vaua paih mai tur a ni.
● Natna vei a la tam loh chuan taidarh zel tur vennan Bavistin (Carbendazim), 3g leh tui 1 litre pawlha kah tur a ni.
● He natna hrik ‘virus’ hi balhla rannung hrik thehdarh a ni.
● Balhla zik a thang thei lova, a bawrchhawr a, a hnah a thang thei lova, leitha pek pawhin awmzia a neilo.
● A natna damdawi nena enkawl dam chi a ni lo.
● Chuvang chuan he natna vei balhla chu a zung atangin a bulbal nen lam kar vek a, halral tur a ni
● A hnah tlan zai zai hi a ro a, a thler bawk thin.
● A hnah pumpui a ukin a de thluah thluah a, hei vang hian a boruak hip a tibuai a,a rah a te in a chhe hle thin.
● A nasat phei chuan a hnah te lo ro in a tawih bawk thin ani.
● Balhla rah inkhai mek pawh a tuk a hun theilo a ni
● A hnah ro sahthlak a, halrak vek tur.
● A nasat dawn chuan Bordeaux mixture 2:2:250 in kah tur. Hei hi a awmloh chuan Dithane M45 pawh a hman theih tho bawk.
● Balhla rah hmin pilah dum bial a lo insiam a,a hmel a timawi lo thin a ni.
● A nasatnaah chuan a pil zawng zawng hi a dum deuh vek a, a nem tawih deuh in fungus pawh a lo lang thei thin.
● He natna hi a tetlaia awm a nih avangin,a hmin hnu ah pawh a lo lang chhuak nghal mai thin ani.
● Rannung thahna hlo Chlorothanlonil (0.2%), 2ml emaw Bavistin (1 %), 1ml, tui litre 1 pawlh a, kar 2 dana kah thin tur a ni.
● A puitling chu a eng dal deuh, thla nei an ni.
● Balhla rah hel pil pawn hi an ei ber a an tihmelhem bawk thin.
● A puitling hian a rah insiam tur hi an bawmin an zuk a, an tui a, a note lo piang a, chu chuan a pil chu an ei chhunzawm thin a ni.
● Balhla par leh hnah hrisel loh paih vek tur a ni.
● A enkawl nan Triazophos 42.8% E C chu 85ml, tui litre 100 chawhpawlh a kah tur a ni.
● Hrik te reuh te te an ni a, hrikhrah ang tak, balhla kungah te,a hnah ah te,a zikah te a vui ah te a tuihnang an dawt thin a ni.
● Balhla hnah khawr/zik kir natna, hri pu darh tu an ni.
● A tuihnang an dawt mai bakah balhla natna awmtirtu Virus a theh darh bawk a ni.
● He virus hi balhla zik bawrchhawr natna ‘Bunchy top’ awmtir tu ber ani.
● A lo tam viau chuan rannungthahna hlo kah tur a ni
● A hrik enkawl nan Rogor emaw Malathion tui litre 1 ah 2gm pawlh a kah tur.
● Tin, Furadon hi a tha hle bawk. Furadon 50 gm kung khat atan a tawk vel a ni.
● A pui chu tuaingawt dum a ni.
● A pui chu balhla hunga a hnah leh a kung tawihah a tui a, a tui keu velah a pangang kha balhla kungah lawnin a kung a hreuh thin,a a pangang hi balhla khertu,a tingettu ber an ni.
● A kung leh a hnah na hreuh a,a hnah chu a tliak a,a pangang awmna lai hi a tawih thin a ni.
● Balhla hmun thlawh faia,a hungah balhla kung leh a hnah chheh hnawk loh tur a ni.
● Tuaingawt in a sehchhiat balhla kung leh a hnah chan darha, pangang leh tuaingawt mana rah hlum vek tur.
● Kutkawr bun chungin emaw, saranga kut tuam chungin emaw Furadon 3G (Carbofuran) chu balhla zikah leh a kungin a hnah athlawpna laiah sawk khat lek lekin dah tur a ni.
● Sephung chikhat balhla rah leh a hnah khel rang t uber an ni.
● He rannung hian balhla hnah no leh rah no pil te an ei a, a ti rang thin.
● A rah pil an ei tial avangin balhla hralh a ti harsa ve thin.
● Ruahtui tlak laiin an pung nasa.
● A hmun thlawh fai that reng tur.
● A nasat na hmunah chuan Carbaryl WP tui litre 1 ah 1gm zel pawlh a hman tur.
A kung hmawr tawih (Damping off)
A hnah tawih (Purple blotch)
A hnah rau val kual (Stemphylium leaf blight)
A hnah rau (Collectotrichum blight/ anthracnose)
A hnah uai/vuai (Downy mildew)
A hnah ei rangtu rannungte (Thrips)
A hnah hreuh rangtu (Allium Leaf miner)
Purun lung (Onion maggot)
A tiak sehchhumtu pangang (Cutworm)
● A chi alo rawp tial tial a, tiak tur a awm lo thin .
● Lei seh chinah a tawih a, a kung a tlu in a thi zui thin.
● A chi tha chauh hmun kanghlang ah kui tur ani.
● Ekdur lei tha tawih tha tak chauh hman tur ani.
● A kung dinglaiah Copper Oxychloride 3gm tui litre khata pawlhin kah tur a ni.
● Purun hnah leh a par chawitu kuangah te tlem a khuar deuhin a rawn val thliah thliah a,a ro zui thin.
● Seng hnuah a dahkhawmna hmunah a tawih chhunzawm duh hle
● Leilung chu tha taka leh phut in, Thlai chi a hun taka thlak tur a ni.
● Thlai chi phun tur chu natna lakah a him tur a ni
● Rannung thahna hlo Mancozeb emaw Chlorothalonil emaw Iprodione emaw Copper Oxychloride 2ml, tui litre 1 a pawlhin natna lan velah kah tur a ni
● Hnah thar 4-5 rawn chawr tirh atang in a intan tlangpui.
● Hnah chu a eng leh serthlum rawng in a rawn kap tan a, a rei hnu ah rawng uk lama inthlak in, a lo lawng chho ta thin ani.
● Thianghlimna ngaih pawimawh tur, hnim leh rannung lakah ven tur.
● Tui luan ralna tha tawk tak siama, bit lutuk lo a phun tur.
● A nasat naah chuan phun anih atanga ni 60 hnu a tan in Mancozeb 2-3 ml tui litre 1 a pawlh, ni 20 danah kah thin tur ani
● Hnah kawm, kir leh eng lo insiam in a nghawng lam chu a nih tur bak aia nasa in a lo sei thin.
● A bul a te a, seng hma in a tawih tlangpui a, seng hnu a dahthatna hmunah pawh a tawih zui zel bawk.
● Huan bul leh a vel tih fai that.
● Purun bul dah ro that (37 -480C vel a sa a em tur).
● Purun bul chu 2-3ml Carbendazim emaw Benomyl 1ml tui litre 1 a chawhpawlha minute 5 chiah tur.
● Thlai dahthatna hi hmun ro leh thengthaw nuam ani tur a ni.
● A hnah hnuai lamah hmuar hri a to phuar thin a ni
● Purun seng na hnu leh hnah ro te lakkhawm a halral tur.
● A natna hrik tawm theihna chi hnim reng reng tih fai vek tur.
● Purun chu Ziram emaw Mancozeb emaw Chlorothalonil emaw Metalaxyl MZ – 72 litre 1 a pawlh dal a, kah tur ani.
● A bul chu tui sa (43oC to 45oC) a darkar 8 chiah hnu ah fungicide hmanga sawngbawl tur.
● Rannung te tak te, mit lawng a hmuh har tak an ni.
● Purun hnah leh a kuang no laiah hreuhin a ro thin a ni.
● A nasatnaah chuan a kung a tlu a, purun a insiam puitling theilo
● Rannung tangkai chi hrang hrang-maimawm te, daidep te leh a dang ho chu zuah hram hram zel tur a ni.
● Rannung thahna hlo Dimethoate chu 2ml, tui litre 1 a pawlhin a nasat viau naah kah tur a ni.
● A puitling chu rawng dum paw lam deuh a lu lam rawng lar lampang, thlawk chi an ni
● A kal kual velna hnuhma chu a zuk ro a,kalkawng angin a inchap vel nuai thin.
● A kung a te in a thang theilo a, a rei hnu ah a lo ro ta thin ani.
● A kung hrisel lo ho zawng chu lak khawm a hal tur ani.
● Seng zawh velah lei atanga lak sawn nghal thin tur ani.
● Hnim thlawh fai that tur.
● Dimethoate emaw Imidacloprid chu 2ml, tui litre 1 a pawlhin a nasat viau naah kah tur a ni.
● Tho chikhat, purun eichhetu a ni.
● A lung chu a hnah kara lutin a zung atanga ker tannin a ei chhe thin.
● A kherna hnuhma atangin natna hrik dang te lutin chhiatna nasa zawk a thlen thin.
● Purun chinna lai thlawh fai reng tur.
● Tui tlinglo tura siam a,a tawk chauh a tui pek tur
● A bul inhlat tawk tura phun tur, a hun takah a tiak phunsawn tur
● Pangang chu vutbuak, a duma tial a ni.
● A pangang chuan a hnah a ei chhum thin.
● Chawhnu lamah an che chhuak deuh ber a, zan lamah lei ah a tawm bo thin.
● A hun taka phun tur ani a, leitha(Fertilizer) pek tlem tur
● Malathion emaw Parathion emaw 2gm, tui litre 1 a chawhpawlhin a nasat naah chauh ni 10 dana kah tur a ni.
A kung hnai la (Gummosis)
Kumthu (Sooty mould)
A hnah rau (Citrus tristeza)
Vutbuak (Powdery mildew)
A rah tawih ( Fruit rot)
Katnelh, a dâwttu (Citrus psylla)
A hnah hreuh rangtu (Citurs leaf miner)
A kung kertu (Trunk borer)
Serthlum rah dawttu(Citrus fruit bug)
Serthlum rah dawttu, lungphur-thlahtu (Fruit sucking moth)
● Ser kung, leiseh chinah a rawn lawng a, a kawr rawn khiin a rawn hnai tuam tuam thin.
● A nasat hnu chuan a tang a ro va, a kung pumpuiin a thih phah thin.
● Hlo thlawh leh leitha pekin ser zung chaw hipna tihpem/tihchhum loh tur.
● Hnai sa-um ang deuh lo chhuahna a pil kha chemte hriam taka ziah thlak a, tihfai hnuah Ridomil MZ-72 @ 2gm tui 1 litre emaw Bordeaux paste bel tur.
● Ser kung atanga 60-100cm chin chu ruahtui tlak hma leh hnuah Bordeaux paste kum 1-ah vawi thum hnawih ziah tur.
● Ser hnah leh a tang bakah, a rahah te hmuar dumin a bawh vak thin.
● Thlai thawkna leh boruak lak luh a tibuai thin.
● He’ng vang hian ser than a tha lovin, a rah te pawhin a tuar thei ve a ni.
● A zar thlak (pruning) ngun tur.
● Rannung awm reng reng damdawia kah tur.
● Bordeaux mixture-a kah tur.
● He virus-ina natna a thlen dan hi a ser azirin a danglam thei.
● A hnah pumpui engin a tla a, a tang a ro thin.
● A pil chhung lamah khuai thlar ang deuhvin khuar chek a awm thin.
● Virus pawisa lo rootstock Rough Lemon, Sweet Orange, Rangpur Lime leh a dangte hman a, an ngeih loh zawng Sour Orange leh Sweet Lime te hman loh tur.
● Natna theh darhtu rannung te thah tur.
● Ser hnah leh a zik noah te chuan a vut buak ang maiin a var tuar thin.
● A hnah sawng tein a rah te pawhin a tlak phah thin.
● Ser tang chu a ler lam atangin a thi thin bawk a ni.
● A natna lo lan veleh ni 10-12 inkar danah vawi 3 tal Calixin 1ml emaw Mancozeb 2gm leh tui 1 litre pawlhin a ser buk pumpui kah chhuah vek tur.
● Ser rah lawh zawh veleh a tang ro, a hring china tan khalh a, Bavistin 1gm tui litre 1-in a kung pumpui uluk taka kah kim vek tur.
● Natnain a beih nasat viau chuan Sulfex 5 gm leh tui litre 1-a kah tur a ni.
● Natna lo lan dan hmasa ber chu a rah puitlingah a ni. A tawih a, a tla thin.
● Tui tling thei lo tura siam a, a kung bul tihro that.
● Copper Oxychloride (Blitox) chu 2.5gm tui litre khata pawlhin, ser rah laia kah a, ni 7 hnua kah nawn leh tur a ni.
● A puitling hi rawng buang, lu zum, taksa aia thla sei an ni.
● A note erawh chu phek, bial deuh, hrik ang tak, serthlum rawng an ni thung.
● Serthlum hnah tui hnang an dawt a, a hnah kir, tla leh tang ro a awmtir thin.
● Khawizu ang tak var an tichhuak a, chu chuan hmuar dum natna a awmtir a, thlai chaw siam a tibuai nasa hle.
● Hnah hring hrisel lo natna thlentu ‘Virus’ theh darhtu a ni.
● Rogor (67ml) emaw Malathion 50ml emaw tui litre 50-a pawlha vawi thum kah tur.
● Feb-March (Chawr no lai), May-June (fur ruah tlak hma), July- August (fur ruah tlak hnu)-a kah tur.
● Nuvacron 10ml emaw Malathion 6.5ml emaw leh tui litre 10 pawlha kah tur.
● A pangang chu a tet laiin a var a, a len hnuah a eng emaw a hring dang emaw a ni thin.
● A puitling chu lungphur te tak te, mit dum, thla hniar var, a hmawr val dum a ni.
● Ser hnah hreuhtu a ni a, ser hnahah chuan hnapkhawn vahna hnu ni awm takin a rang riak thin.
● Rogor (67ml) emaw Malathion 10ml emaw tui litre 10-a pawlha vawi thum kah tur.
● Neem cake 300gm, tui litre 5-a pawlh emaw Dimecron 1.22 ml, tui litre 1-a pawlh emawa kah tur.
● A puitling chu sephung lam chi, che muang tak an ni.
● Mizorama ser tichhe nasa bertu a ni.
● A nu chu ser hawng chhungah a malin a tui a, a lungin a kung a khamphei zawnga a verh hnuin a chho zawngin a verh leh a, ser kung an ei chhe thin.
● Ser hnah a zung tel lova ei kawlh thin an ni.
● A kung nget kuaah tuibur emaw khaini emaw Neemazole emaw hnawh luh a, chirha bel phui tur.
● May-June thla vela a buk sawi a, a puitling thah leh a kung nget thirzaia kawm chhuah.
● Ser kung metre 2 chin thleng Sevin 10ml, tui litre 1-a pawlha hnawih a tha.
● Hei hi Mizovin thlangdar hring kan ti.
● Thlangdar rimchhe tak an ni a, ser rah chu a zuk thin. Ser rah tihuttu pakhat an ni.
● Ser rah a zuk tawh apiang chu a lo bawlin a piangsual a, a kha em em thin a ni.
● Thlangdar chu veh a, thah tur a ni.
● Thlangdar chu veh a, thah tur a ni.
● Lungphur lian, a thla serthlum rawng kai, a duma de thek.
● Lungphurthlahtu chi khat a ni a, a pui hian ser rah chu a zukin a dawt thin.

● Lungphur suat nan ser huanah khawnvar, electric bulb chhi i la, a hnuaiah chawhtawlh hung i la, tah chuan a khatin tui dah i la, sahbawn nuai phuan i la, khawnvartui tlem pawlh bawk tur a ni. Tichuan, rannung thlawk chu a rei hnuah tuiah chuan a tla hlum teuh mai ang. Chu chu zingah paih tur a ni.
● A rah tlate chu chhar khawm a, paih vek tur a ni.
Vutbuak (Powdery mildew)
A hnah kir (Leaf curl)
A hnah rau/eng (papaya mosaic)
A rah natna (Anthracnose)
A hnah leh rah bawmtu var (Papaya mealybug)
A thlawk var (papaya whitefly)
Khau (Grasshopper)
A hnah tuihnang dâwttu(Aphids)
● Ruahtui leh hnawng awm tam hunlaiin he natna hi a awm duh hle
● A hnah chunglam a lo var phût a, a rei hnu phei chuan a duk uk thut thin a ni.
● A lo rei deuh hnuah a hnah a ro a, a tla kawlh mai thin.
● Natna a lo lan veleh Sulphur/Sulfex @30gm/10 Litre (tui) a kah thin tur a ni.
● A kah hun hi a nasat dan a zirin ni 15 danah kah tur a ni.
● He viral natna hi rannung ‘whitefly’ thehdarh a ni a, a tlangpuiin a kung la nau deuh an bei thin a ni.
● A natna lanchhuah dan chu a hnah a lo kir a, a eng a, a nasat phei chuan an tla kawlh thin a ni
● Natna lang hmasa apiang chu pawh phawi a, paih daih tur a ni
● Tin, a natna pu darhtu rannung control nan: 1. Carbofuran (1kg/ha) hi phun dawnin leiah theh thin tur a ni. 2. Imidachlorprid (1ml/L) hi a rannung kah nan a hman theih bawk.
● He natna hi viral niin, rannung ‘Aphids-Hrik’ in an thehdarh thin.
● A hnah a zuk ro a, a hnah hring zam a lo eng a, hnah dang erawh chu a hring tak nghulh thin. Tin, a hnah a chhah tup thin bawk
● Natna lang hmasa apiang chu pawhphawi a paih daih tur a ni
● Tin, a natna pudarhtu rannung control nan: Carbofuran (1kg/ha) hi phun dawnin leiah theh thin tur a ni.
● Imidachlorprid (1ml/L) hi a rannung kah nan a hman theih bawk.
● Thingfanghma rah la hring lai pilah dum bial a lo insiam a,a hmel a timawilo thin a ni.
● A nasatnaah chuan a pil zawng zawng hi a dum deuh vek a, a nem tawih deuh a, hmuar var a pawh a lang thei thin.
● He natna hi a rah a tet laia awm tan a ni a, a rah hminah a lo lang ta mai thin a ni
● Rannung thahna hlo Chlorothanlonil (0.2%), 2ml emaw Bavistin (1 %), 1ml, tui litre 1 pawlh a, kar 2 dana kah thin tur a ni.
● An rawng hi a var a, an awmkhawm deuh tuak thin
● A hnah chu a lo ro a, a ram a, amahin a tla kawlh mai thin a ni
● He rannung hian thil thlum a pechhuakin a tihnawm a, chu chuan inting hmuar dum a siam belh thin bawk.
● A par leh hnah hrisel loh paih vek tur a ni.
● Neem based rannung hlo (3ml/ L) a hman theih
● A nasat naah chuan Acetamiprid (Systemic insecticide) hman tur a ni (1g/Ll)
● Hrik var te reuh te te an ni a, an thlawk sep sep thin
● Thingfanghma hnah khawr/zik kir natna, hri pu darhtu an ni.
● A tuihnang a dawt mai bakah Thingfanghma natna awmtirtu Virus a theh darh bawk a ni.
● A lo tam viau chuan rannungthahna hlo kah tur a ni
● A hrik enkawl nan Rogor emaw Malathion emaw tui litre 1 ah 2gm pawlh a kah tur.
● Tin, Furadon hi a tha hle bawk. Kung khat atan Furadon 50 gm a tawk vel a ni.
● A pui chu a hring a, an ka hian Thingfanghma hnah a zuk a, a sehchhum thin bawk
● A pui hian a hnah an zuk hian an chil hmangin chemical an kap lut a, chu chuan a hnah a ti eng a, a ti kir thei bawk a, chu chuan ‘hopper burn’ a siam thin a ni
● Tin, a zik no hi an sehchum thin bawk.
● Imidachlorprid (systemic insecticide) hi a control nana hman tur a ni.(1ml/L)
● Hring te reuh te te, a hnah a tui hnang an zuk ro thin.
● Thingfanghma hnah rau an thlen thin a, hnah zam (vein) a ti eng thin bawk.
● Tin, viral natna ‘mosaic’ pudarhtu an ni bawk
● A lo tam viau chuan rannungthahna hlo kah tur a ni
● Acetamiprid hi aphids tamna ah chuan a tangkai hle (1gm/L).
A hnah tawih (Black rot)
Hnar rau (Downy mildew)
A tiak lawng (Damping off)
A hnah hnuailam var (White rust)
Zikhlum hrik (Aphid)
Pangangte (Diamond back moth)
Hnah char khawmtu pangang (Leaf webber)
A tiak sehchhumtu pangang (Cutworm)
Pangang hring (Large white cabbage butterfly)
● Thlai hnahah chuan, a tlang atanga intan in, ‘V’ ang deuhin a val lut thin.
● A hnah leh a zungte chu a dum ruak thin a ni.
● Thlai chi damdawia chiah chauh kui tur.
● Natna vei Thlai chu tihral vat tur.
● Blitox-50 , 2ml chu tui litre 1 a pawhin Thlai phun atanga kar 6 naah kah tur, chumi hnu chuan ni 15 dan zela kah tur.
● A hnah hnuai lamah val in,heng a val laiah hian hmuar a rawn to thin.
● A hnah hmuar te chu a ro a, a tla thin a ni.
● Hnim thlawh fai reng tur a ni.
● Natna in abawh thlai chu Mancozeb emaw Copper Oxychloride 5gm tui litre khat a pawlh a, ni 10 danah vawi hnih kah thin tur a ni.
● Thlai chi chu tiak chhuak zo lo in a thi thin.
● A tiak chhuak a nih pawhin reiloteah a kung chu leiseh chinah lawngin a thi leh mai thin.
● Tui tling a awm tur a nilo
● Lei sawngbawl nan Dithane M 45 emaw Bavistin emaw 2gm tui litre khat a pawlh a,lei ah leih tur a ni.
● A tawih a awm chuan paih tur a ni.
● Thlai hnahah chuan te reuh te te in a var tliah tlaih a,a par leh a peng hrang hrangte a chhah tup thin.
● Natna in a bawm hnah chu paih vek tur
● Natna in a bawh Thlai chu Mancozeb emaw Copper Oxychloride 5gm tui litre khat a pawlh a, ni 10 danah vawi hnih kah thin tur a ni
● Thlai hrik te reuh te, hring eng lam an ni
● Thlai peng hrang hrang an zuk thin a,a hlumah an lut a,an eichhe thin.
● Zikhlum hnah pawnlang deuh te chu phunsawn hnu ah pawh a la sen laiin an ei chhe thin.
● Seng tlai deuh leh a chawrno te pawh a hrik hian a bawm a, a tui an hip thin.
● Neemazal 2ml, tui litre 1 a chawhpawlhin chawlh kar danah kah thin tur a ni
● Malathion emaw Parathion emaw 2gm, tui litre 1 a chawhpawlhin a nasat naah chauh ni 10 dana kah tur a ni.
● Pangang hring te reuh te te an ni a, a huho a khawsa thin an ni.
● A kuang ah emaw phunsawn hnuah emaw a hnah an seh pawpin a zik pawh a rawt hial thin.
● Malathion emaw Parathion emaw 2gm, tui litre 1 a chawhpawlhin a nasat naah chauh ni 10 dana kah tur a ni.
● Pangang chu a hring, a var a tial a ni.
● Pangang ina a sehna chu a kawlh rul zel a ni.
● Maimawm ril angin a hnah a zial khawr thin.
● A Hnah tla leh tawih chu paih fai vek tur
● Lungphur chu man a, thah tur
● Chlorpyriphos 20 % EC 2ml, tui litre 1 a chawhpawlhin a nasat naah chauh ni 10 dana kah tur a ni.
● Pangang chu vutvuak, a duma tial a ni
● Phunsawn hlim ah leh a hnu deuhah a lei seh chinah an chilh chhum thin.
● Phun hmain hnim zawng zawng paih fai vek tur.
● Thlai phun tlai, tui luan kawrh thalo, leitha pek nasat lutuk leh tui pek zin lutuk pumpelh vek tur a ni.
● Malathion emaw Parathion emaw 2gm, tui litre 1 a chawhpawlhin a nasat naah chauh ni 10 dana kah tur a ni.
● Pangang chu rawng hring tak lam leh dum a in chawih, hmul deuh thep ani.
● Phunsawn hnuah a hnah tlang atanga ei tan in a kuang chauh zuahin an ei filh vek thin.
● A pangang chu a theih ang anga man khawm a, thah tur.
● Seng hma kar thum la awm ah Malathion 1ml tui litre 1 a pawlh in kah tur ani.
